cab.content: -4/fljiemated by the secretary of state for india.From Viceroy, Foreign Department, 2nd May 1917.secret. afghanistan. monthly report. internal situation unchanged. amir is reported to have recently expressed to his entourage his gratification at appreciation of his policy by british statesmen and to have expressed his displeasure at attempted misrepresentation by certain of his officials of our military preparations on frontier as being directed against afghanistan.news of fall of baghdad reported to have greatly disconcerted pro-german faction and to have given satisfaction to amir as calculated to strengthen his hands. recent events in russia do not appear so far to have excited any particular interest in afghanistan.
